text: Ryan Thomas Gosling (born November 12, 1980) is a Canadian actor, director, musician , singer and writer. He is known for his roles in The Notebook, in Half Nelson, The Big Short, La La Land, Blade Runner 2049 and Barbie. For his role in La La Land, he won a Golden Globe Award. == Early and personal life == thumb|right|180px|At the 2014 Cannes Film Festival. Gosling was born on November 12, 1980 in London, Ontario, Canada. He studied at Cornwall Collegiate, at the Vocational School, and at the Lester B. Pearson High School. He now lives in Los Angeles, California. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian movie actors Category:Musicians from London, Ontario Category:Canadian movie producers Category:Canadian stage actors Category:Canadian television actors Category:Canadian voice actors Category:Writers from London, Ontario Category:Actors from London, Ontario Category:Golden Globe Award winning actors Category:21st-century Canadian people
title: Ryan Gosling
